class.name: Terrain3DAssets
class.description: This class contains arrays of [Terrain3DTextureAsset] and [Terrain3DMeshAsset] resources. It is a savable resource, so you can save it to disk and use the same asset list in multiple scenes that use Terrain3D. The amount of data is small, so it can be saved as a git-friendly, text based .tres file or left within the scene file.

method.name: create_mesh_thumbnails
method.description: Generates mesh asset preview thumbnails for the asset dock, stored within each mesh asset. Specify id -1 to generate all.

method.name: get_albedo_array_rid
method.description: Returns the resource ID of the TextureArray generated from combining all albedo and height textures.

method.name: get_mesh_count
method.description: Returns the number of mesh assets in the list.

method.name: get_normal_array_rid
method.description: Returns the resource ID of the TextureArray generated from combining all normal and roughness textures.

method.name: get_texture
method.description: Returns the Terrain3DTextureAsset with the requested ID.

method.name: get_texture_colors
method.description: Returns the array of all albedo colors used in the texture assets, indexed by asset id.

method.name: get_texture_count
method.description: Returns the number of texture slots used.

method.name: get_texture_detiles
method.description: Returns the array of all detiling values used in the texture assets, indexed by asset id.

method.name: get_texture_uv_scales
method.description: Returns the array of all uv scale values used in the texture assets, indexed by asset id.

method.name: save
method.description: Saves this texture list resource to disk, if saved as an external [code skip-lint].tres[/code] or [code skip-lint].res[/code] resource file. path - specifies a directory and file name to use from now on.

method.name: set_mesh_asset
method.description: Assigns the Terrain3DMeshAsset to the specified ID slot. It can be null to clear the slot. See [method set_texture].

method.name: set_texture
method.description: Adds a Terrain3DTextureAsset at the specified ID slot. The texture can be null to clear the slot, or remove it if its the last in the list. If the specified slot is full, it will be swapped with the source texture ID, or will find the next available ID.

method.name: update_mesh_list
method.description: Updates the internal list of meshes used by the instancer.

method.name: update_texture_list
method.description: Regenerates the texture arrays from the list of texture assets, which is sent to the shader.

signal.name: meshes_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the mesh list is updated, which happens as a result of a [Terrain3DMeshAsset] changing.

signal.name: textures_changed
signal.description: Emitted when this list is updated due to changes in the texture slots, or the files or settings of any [Terrain3DTextureAsset].

constants.constant: Hard coded maximum number of textures, with IDs in the range of 0-31. Cannot easily be expanded.
Limit of the maximum number of meshes. Arbitrary, easily expanded.
